member.name: M:WHLClasses.SkuCollection.AdvancedSearch(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: This funciton does some clever searching. It also probably takes a while because it does a lot of searches and comparisons. RIP IN PIECES CPU.
member.param: The standard search terms. Enter a nothing value to return everything.
Limit the search to a category. Defaults to nothiong.
Limit the search to a supplier. Defaults to nothing.
Boolean value to make the results match all search terms. Defaults to True.
Set the search term divider. Default is space.
member.returns: A collection of SKUs (in a skucollection) which meets the specified criteria.
